description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the BitLocker security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-43513):

1. Identify your Windows version and build.
2. Download and apply the relevant KB updates based on your Windows version from the links below.
3. Restart your system to ensure that the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- The following KB articles address this vulnerability:
  - Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5044284](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044284)
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5044285](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044285)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5044273](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5044273)
- Ensure your system is on a supported version to receive these updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with installations.
